6100.description:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.
6100.long_desc: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
6100.name: warg

6101.description:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.
6101.long_desc: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
6101.name: warg

6102.description: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.
6102.long_desc: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
6102.name: wolf

6103.description: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.
6103.long_desc: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
6103.name: wolf

6110.description:
Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.
Something about it makes you think that this is not a normal oak tree.

The enormous grey trunk shivers slightly, as if sighing deeply.
6110.long_desc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
6110.name: tree

6111.description:
Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.
Something about it makes you think that this is not a normal oak tree.

The enormous grey trunk emits a deep, moaning sound.
6111.long_desc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
6111.name: tree

6112.description:
This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its
colossal body.  Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as
does the nicks in the horns on its head.  It smells as disgusting as only
dragons do.
6112.long_desc: A huge green dragon is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.
6112.name: dragon

6113.description:
This disgusting creature is at the size of a human crawling on all four.  It
has eight hairy legs that gives it a tremendous speed on almost any surface
and sharp poisonous fangs to paralyze or kill its prey.
6113.long_desc: A huge, poisonous spider is here.
6113.name: spider

6114.description:
This disgusting creature is at the size of a small elephant.  It has eight
huge, hairy legs that would give it a tremendous speed on almost any surface
if it wasn't so immensely fat.  Its large, bulbous eyes stare back at you.
6114.long_desc: The huge, bulky Queen spider is here.
6114.name: queen

6115.description:
This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and
long tangled brown beard.  He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks
as if he is having great fun.
6115.long_desc: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.
6115.name: shargugh

6116.description:
The druid looks quite old.  You would think of him as venerable but yet you
know he would be a tough foe.
6116.long_desc: The Elder druid is here.  He looks very upset about your presence in his home.
6116.name: elder

6117.description:
She is no less than beautiful, skin as dark as the night and hair
shining like silver in the moonlight.  Her slender body is adorned
with a sleeveless shirt and a short skirt made from black scales
joined with silver threads.  Her back is covered by a large, hooded
cloak as black as her skin and in her broad silver belt hangs a long,
slender sword in a silver scabbard.
6117.long_desc: Isha the Dark Elf is here, observing you silently.
6117.name: isha

6198.name: wounded forest spirit
6198.long_desc: A luminous forest spirit flickers weakly here, its glow barely visible among the twisted trees.
6198.description: What was once a radiant being of living light is now dim and wounded, its form cracked like broken glass. The corruption of the dark forest is slowly consuming it.

talk_responses.hello: The spirit's voice is like wind through dead leaves. 'This forest... was beautiful once. The corruption came from below, from something buried deep. The glade still holds, but for how long? If you find the silver mushrooms, follow them. The glade needs protectors.'
talk_responses.corruption: The spirit shudders. 'It feeds on anger and fear. The beasts here are not evil — they are suffering. End them quickly, if you must. It is a mercy.'
talk_responses.default: The forest spirit pulses faintly, its light flickering like a dying ember.
talk_responses.next: Wounded Forest Spirit regards you with hollow eyes. 'The Drow City lies deeper underground — if you've conquered this forest, you may be ready for their treachery. The mines of Moria also hold secrets in their deepest levels, and the city of Thalos could use fighters like you.'

6101.name: sign
6101.room_desc: An old, battered sign lies on the ground.

6102.name: tree
6102.room_desc: A colossal tree blocks the way westward.

6103.name: branch
6103.room_desc: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

6104.name: branch
6104.room_desc: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

6105.name: branch
6105.room_desc: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

6108.name: coins
6108.room_desc: A big pile of gold coins is lying here.
6108.short_desc: a big pile of gold coins

6109.name: potion
6109.room_desc: A blue potion has been left here.

6110.name: potion
6110.room_desc: A yellow potion has been left here.

6111.name: shield
6111.room_desc: A large round shield has been left here.

6112.name: crown
6112.room_desc: An iron crown rests on the ground.

6113.name: sceptre
6113.room_desc: An iron sceptre lies on the ground.

6114.name: ring
6114.room_desc: An iron ring has been left here.

6115.name: star
6115.room_desc: the morning star is here collecting dust while it lies on the ground.

6116.name: shirt
6116.room_desc: A black dragon scale shirt has been left here.

6117.name: skirt
6117.room_desc: A black dragon scale skirt has been left here.

6118.name: cloak
6118.room_desc: A large, hooded cloak, as dark as the night, has been left here.

6119.name: belt
6119.room_desc: A broad silver belt has been left here.

6120.name: sword
6120.room_desc: A long, slender sword lies on the ground.

6100.description:
The area is a narrow trail winding its way between the enormous, grey
trunks. The crowns of the trees must be very dense, as they leave the
forest floor in utter darkness. The trail leads east and west. Bird
calls echo through the canopy. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: The narrow trail leads east to a somewhat lighter part of the forest.

north.description: A small shadowy path leads away to the north.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6100.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6101.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge,
ancient trees whose grey trunks remind you of ancient pillars in a
enormous, deserted hall. To the south, a frail path leads away from the
trail. Bird calls echo through the canopy. The scent of pine and earth
fills the air.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

south.description: The path leads south - away from the trail.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6101.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6102.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge,
ancient trees that stand close on all sides. Not a sound is to be heard
- everything is ominously quiet. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering
the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6102.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6103.description:
The area is where the dusty trail bends, as to avoid conflict with a
colossal trunk to the west. Not a sound is to be heard - everything is
ominously quiet. The trail leads east and south and there is a small
path leading off the trail to the north. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

north.description: A small path leads north off the trail.

south.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

6103.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6104.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. You
feel as if the ancient trees observe you in watchful silence. The path
continues north and south. Ancient trees rise on all sides. The scent of
pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

6104.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest

6105.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient
grey trees loom all around. The path continues north and west. Branches
intertwine overhead, filtering the light. Ancient trees rise on all
sides.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6105.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest

6106.description:
The area is by a junction where three paths meet. Ancient grey trees
tower above on all sides. Paths lead east, south and west. The forest
floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6106.name: A Junction In The Deep, Dark Forest

6107.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient
grey trees loom all around. The path continues north and east. Ancient
trees rise on all sides. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

6107.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest

6108.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees
standing close on all sides. The trail leads north and west and to the
south, a frail path leads away from the trail. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air.

north.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.

south.description: The path leads south - away from the trail.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6108.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6109.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge,
ancient trees that stand close on all sides. Not a sound is to be heard
- everything is ominously quiet. Ancient trees rise on all sides. The
forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6109.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6110.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees
that stand close on all sides. The trail leads east and south. To the
west, a narrow path leads away from the trail. Bird calls echo through
the canopy. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

south.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

west.description: The narrow path leads west between the giant trees.

6110.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6111.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way north-south between huge,
ancient trees that loom ominously above. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

north.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.

south.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

6111.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6112.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees
standing close on all sides. The trail leads north and west and to the
east, a frail path leads away from the trail. The scent of pine and
earth fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: The path leads east - away from the trail.

north.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6112.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6113.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient
grey trees loom in all directions. The path continues south and west.
Ancient trees rise on all sides. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6113.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest

6114.description:
The area is by a junction where three paths meet. Ancient grey trees
tower above on all sides. Paths lead north, east and west. Bird calls
echo through the canopy. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6114.name: A Junction In The Deep, Dark Forest

6115.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. You
feel as if the ancient trees observe you in watchful silence. The path
continues north and west. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the
light. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6115.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest

6116.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Giant,
grey trees loom ominously on all sides. The path continues east and
south. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Bird calls echo through the
canopy.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

6116.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest

6117.description:
The area is by a junction where three paths meet. Ancient, grey trees
seem to observe you silently you from all sides. Paths lead north, east
and west. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. The scent
of pine and earth fills the air.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6117.name: A Junction In The Deep, Dark Forest

6118.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.
Ancient, grey trees loom everywhere. The path continues south and west.
The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through
the canopy.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6118.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest

6119.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Huge,
ancient trees are on all sides. The path continues north and south.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. The scent of pine and
earth fills the air.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

6119.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest

6120.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. To the
south a fast river is flowing westward through the forest. Ancient grey
trees loom on both banks. The path continues north and west. Ancient
trees rise on all sides. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

south.description: It looks as if you can enter the fast flowing river just to the south.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6120.name: On The River Bank In The Deep, Dark Forest

6121.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. The
ancient trees stand so close that the path disappears between the dusty
roots. To the south a dark river flows from east to west. The only exit
appears to be east. The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Ancient
trees rise on all sides.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

6121.name: A Dead End Path On The River Bank In The Deep, Dark Forest

6122.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Giant,
grey trees loom ominously all around. The path continues east and south.
The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. The scent of pine and
earth fills the air.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

6122.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest

6123.description:
The area is by a junction where three paths meet. Ancient, grey trees
seem to observe you silently you from all around. To the south a dark
river flows from east to west through the forest. Paths lead north, east
and west. Bird calls echo through the canopy. Ancient trees rise on all
sides.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6123.name: A Junction On The River Bank In The Deep, Dark Forest

6124.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. The
ancient trees stand so close that the path disappears between the dusty
roots. To the south a dark river flows from east to west. The only exit
appears to be west. Bird calls echo through the canopy. Ancient trees
rise on all sides.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6124.name: A Dead End Path In The Deep, Dark Forest

6125.description:
The area is a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient
grey trees loom everywhere. To the south a dark river flows westward
through the forest. The path continues north and east. Bird calls echo
through the canopy. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

6125.name: A Small Path On The River Bank In The Deep, Dark Forest

6126.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees
standing close on all sides. The trail leads north and west, and to the
south a frail path leads away from the trail. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the
light.

north.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.

south.description: The path leads south - away from the trail.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6126.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6127.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees
standing close on all sides. The trail leads east and south. Ancient
trees rise on all sides. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

south.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

6127.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6128.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge,
ancient trees that stand close on all sides. Not a sound is to be heard
- everything is ominously quiet. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6128.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6129.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge,
ancient trees that stand close on all sides. Not a sound is to be heard
- everything is ominously quiet. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6129.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6130.description:
The area is a dusty trail winding its way westward between huge, ancient
trees that stand close on all sides. The tree trunks seem to be covered
in some sticky substance which gets much stickier towards the west!
Beware! The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Bird calls echo
through the canopy.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

up.description: Above you, the trail climbs into On The spider web, where thick strands drape the branches. The air grows colder as the forest tightens.

west.description: The sticky substance is hanging like ropes between the trees just above the path.  To the west the path seems to be covered with these giant threads covered with glue.  You can sense the forces of evil coming from the west and your bones tell you it may not be such a good idea to proceed.

6130.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6131.description:
A path winds along the narrow path, ducking under the sticky ropes as
you advance... > A huge, poisonous spider drops from above! A huge,
poisonous spider drops from above! A huge, poisonous spider drops from
above! > The huge, poisonous spider stings you! You resist the poison!
The huge, poisonous spider stings you! The area is poisoned! The huge,
poisonous spider stings you! The area is poisoned! The area is dead.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. The scent of pine and
earth fills the air.

east.description: To the east, the shadowed path winds toward A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest. The canopy above swallows the light and the air smells of wet earth.

up.description: Above you, sticky strands tighten into a webbed path toward On The spider web. The darkness clings to the silk like tar.

west.description: To the west, the shadowed path winds toward The Den Of The Queen Spider. The canopy above swallows the light and the air smells of wet earth.

6131.name: The Deadly Spider Web

6132.description:
The area is hanging on the outside of a huge tree trunk covered in a
sticky substance. Directly to the west is an immense spider web
suspended between numerous of the giant trees including the one you are
hanging on. To the north is what looks like a large webbed entrance. The
water is cool and clear. Sunlight sparkles on the water.

down.description: Downwards is the narrow forest path.

north.description: To the north is what looks like a large expanse of webbing which extends very far into the trees.

west.description: To the west is the immense spider web.  It seems to move softly.

6132.name: Up In The Tree

6133.description:
The area is balancing carefully on the giant sticky threads that holds
the giant web in place. To the east is a giant tree trunk and to the
west is an entrance to a cave-like structure made from many layers of
spider web. Sunlight sparkles on the water. The water is cool and clear.

east.description: To the east is the giant tree trunk.

west.description: To the west is the entrance to the cave-like structure.

6133.name: On The spider web

6134.description:
This isside a cave-like structure that seems to be made entirely from
countless layers of spider web. Temperature and humidity is very high
making it hard to breathe the foul air that lingers here. The walls are
covered with open cocoons. The current tugs gently at your limbs. The
water is cool and clear.

east.description: Compared to this place the east exit looks inviting.

6134.name: The Den Of The Queen Spider

6135.description:
The area is a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient
grey trees loom all around. The trail continues north and east. The
scent of pine and earth fills the air. Bird calls echo through the
canopy.

east.description: The dusty trail leads east through the trees.

north.description: The dusty trail leads north through the trees.

6135.name: A Dusty Trail In The Deep, Dark Forest

6136.description:
The area is a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest.
Ancient, grey trees loom everywhere. The trail continues south and west.
A broad irregular path leads eastward away from the trail. The scent of
pine and earth fills the air. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: The trees standing on the sides of the path have scratch marks on them.

south.description: The dusty trail leads south through the trees.

west.description: The dusty trail leads west through the trees.

6136.name: A Dusty Trail In The Deep, Dark Forest

6137.description:
The area is a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient
grey trees loom all around. A small trail leads northwards and the only
other exit is east, along the main trail. Ancient trees rise on all
sides. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

east.description: The dusty trail leads east through the trees.

north.description: A narrow trail leads northwards through the underbrush.

6137.name: At The End Of The Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest

6138.description:
The trail continues to the north and south as it leads through the heavy
underbrush of this part of the Haon-Dor Forest. Ancient grey trees loom
all around. The brush seems to be bending closely over the path in a
somewhat ominous manner, but you easily shrug it off. The trail looks to
open up somewhat a short distance to the south. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air.

north.description: The narrow trail continues northwards through the underbrush.

south.description: The dusty trail leads east through the trees.

6138.name: On The Narrow Trail

6139.description:
The trail continues to the north and south as it leads through the heavy
underbrush of this part of the Haon-Dor Forest. The trail looks
surprisingly well trodden along this part. The brush seems to be bending
closely over the path in a somewhat ominous manner, but you easily shrug
it off. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo
through the canopy.

north.description: A short distance to the north, you can see something shimmering.

south.description: The path leads southwards through the underbrush.

6139.name: On The Narrow Trail

6142.description:
This is the end of a broad, irregular path. To the north is a very large
ominous-looking cave opening. The trees here have many marks as if
something with huge claws has been tearing at them in rage. The scent of
pine and earth fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering
the light.

north.description: The disgusting smell of a large reptile emanates from the cave opening.

west.description: The path winds its way westward.

6142.name: Outside A Cave In The Deep, Dark Forest

6143.description:
This is a big natural cave. The floor is littered with bones of all
sorts and the stench is so massive that you could cut it with a knife.
The only exit is to the south. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

south.description: The exit leads out into the forest.

6143.name: The Cave Of The Green Dragon

6150.description:
This trail looks much spookier than any other that's you have seen. The
usual animal claw marks and bites on the trees are becoming few and far
between. The trail continues north. The scent of pine and earth fills
the air. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: The narrow trail continues north.

south.description: The trail intersects the main forest path.

6150.name: The Narrow Trail

6151.description:
This area of the trail is also very peculiar. Visible is no signs of
animal life what so ever. The structure of the surrounding trees forces
the path to make a sharp turn to the east. Ancient trees rise on all
sides. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

east.description: The trail bends east.

south.description: The start of the trail.

6151.name: The Narrow Trail

6152.description:
The trees here seem to form a circle around the enormous tree in the
center. You notice a wooden door carved into the huge tree to the east.
The trail that you followed to get here seems to end at the base of the
tree. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. Bird calls echo
through the canopy.

east.description: The tree door is carved beautifully.

west.description: The bend on the trail.

6152.name: The Circle Of Trees

6153.description:
You have stepped inside of this hollowed tree. From here steps lead down
into darkness or you can exit the tree by going west. Bird calls echo
through the canopy. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

down.description: The steps look appear like they will hold your weight.

west.description: The door is carved beautifully.

6153.name: Inside The Great Tree

6154.description:
This hallway is apparently one of the roots of the tree hollowed out.
The hall leads south to a room where you hear strange noises or you can
go up the steps. The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Bird calls
echo through the canopy.

south.description: The hallway looks quite grand.

up.description: The steps appear like they will hold your weight.

6154.name: The Underground Hallway

6155.description:
This temple, built to a god you don't worship, is a nice place to visit
but you feel very uncomfortable about spending any amount of time here.
The wooden altar seems to almost glow as you enter the room. The only
exit is the way you came in. Bird calls echo through the canopy.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: The hallway to the north looks quite grand.

6155.name: The Cultist Temple
